title: Actuarial Technician, Model Governance
content:
Job Summary
The Actuarial Technician assists the Actuarial Model Governance team with managing the governance and controls around the actuarial model change management process and collabortationg with the F&G acturaies in various parts of the company.
Duties and Responsibilities

Review and tracking of actuarial models changes to ensure for compliance with F&G’s model risk management policy
Maintain a central repository of up-to-date actuarial model materials for all F&G actuaries on SharePoint
Assist with the management of  tools for the tracking actuarial model changes through the software development lifecycle
Assist with the preparation of materials for meetings with F&G senior actuarial leaders 
Collaborate within the respective team to help Actuarial Models team leadership with ensuring for the timely development, testing, and integration of actuarial model changes
Assists with drafting and maintance of actuarial model governance documentation.

Experience and Education Requirements

Bachelors Degree preferred. Preferrably in Mathematics, Finance, Computer Science, Actuarial Science or other related technical field
Experience in Financial Services Industry preferred
Experience with Microsoft Office Products (Excel, Access, Word, Powerpoint)
Experience with financial projection models, understanding of software development life cycle best practices
SharePoint experience preferred

Knowledge, Skills & Abilities

Knowledge of Microsoft Office applications (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Access).
Effective verbal and written communication.
Self-starter who demonstrates strong initiative and displays a high energy level.
Team player who has the ability to function as a key member of a small group.
High degree of ownership for their areas of responsibility.

Other Requirements

Perform other functions, duties and projects as assigned
Regular and punctual attendance
Some travel required (less than 10%)

#LI-JB1
#LI-Remote
 Additional Information 
Work Environments
F&G believes in an employee-centric flexible environment, which is why we offer the ability for in-office, hybrid and remote work arrangements. During the hiring process, you'll work with your leader to decide what works best for your role.
Join our employee-centric hybrid work environment: F&G Careers
About F&G
Since 1959, Fidelity & Guaranty Life Insurance Company (F&G) has offered annuity and life insurance products to those who are seeking security in retirement and protection during life’s unexpected events.
As a national Top Workplace1, an Iowa Top Workplace2 and a proud equal opportunity employer, F&G team members are empowered, collaborative, dynamic and authentic. We believe that by embracing these values, we will continue to build and strengthen the company while continuing to be a great place to work.
1Top Workplaces USA 2022 – 2023 
2Des Moines Register Top Workplaces 2018 – 2022
